name: igua-rpg
description: A fangame of Oddwarg Animal RPG.

scripts.build: npm run gen:sounds -- --build && npm run gen:music -- --build && parcel build --public-url ./ src/index.html
scripts.watch-gen:assets: concurrently "npm run gen:textures" "npm run gen:sounds" "npm run gen:music"
scripts.gen:levelargs: rimraf ./tools/write-levelargs2/.bin && cross-env NODE_ENV=development PUBLISH_GAME_OBJECT_RESOLVERS=true parcel build --public-url ./ src/index.html --out-dir ./tools/write-levelargs2/.bin/.app --cache-dir ./.gen/cache --no-minify --no-content-hash --no-source-maps && npm start --prefix ./tools/write-levelargs2

author: Hubol
